*<http://Digital.com|Digital.com> is hiring a Managing Editor* :rocket:

*This is a full-time role.*

*What's the deal?* 

<http://Digital.com|Digital.com> hosts two types of content and this person will manage both. First, the team focuses on software reviews. The team reviews software by category (e.g., "best email marketing tools") and also reviews specific tools (e.g., "Constant Contact review"). This content is the productâ€”<http://Digital.com|Digital.com> monetizes with affiliate partnerships with some of the tools they reviews. Second, they create editorial content to help their target readers (mostly small business owners and marketers) do their jobs better.

This is an awesome role for a content person who knows some SEO and loves helping small business owners.

*Learn more and apply here:* <https://bit.ly/2QRJQge>

<@UJG9WTEKG>

text:
*Animalz is hiring a Technical Content Marketing Manager* :rocket:

*This is a full-time role.*

*What's the deal?* 

This role blends technical knowledge and experience with best-in-class writing for customers. Successful candidates should be able to learn new topics quickly and be comfortable asking questions to better their understanding of technical subject matter, including software development, programming languages, user experience (UX), and open source software (OSS).

Ideal Content Marketing Managers have experience writing highly technical long-form (~1,500 word) content and managing customer accounts.

*Learn more and apply here:* <https://bit.ly/3dJ18oM>

<@UM2A21SJW>

attachments.title: Technical Content Marketing Manager
attachments.text: New York, New York, United States

text:
*Animalz is hiring a Content Marketing Manager* :rocket:

*This is a full-time role.*

*What's the deal?* 

Our Content Marketing Managers (or CMs, as you'll probably hear them called) are the backbone of the work we do at Animalz. While working closely with a Content Strategist and Editor, CMs write approximately two pieces per week, proactively manage their customer relationships, and work to level up their knowledge of SEO, strategy, and other content-related skills.

*Learn more and apply here:* <https://bit.ly/3tLY40B>

<@UM2A21SJW>
